ComicInfo.Summary:
The vampire-assassin, Chastity has a new target---homicidal super-zombie, Evil Ernie! It's a brutal, take-no-prisoners brawl between Chaos! 's favorite undead deathdealers! Tim Seeley of Batman: Eternal, Hack/Slash, Revival fame reestablishes the Chaos! Universe for fans old and new.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Emanuela Lupacchino | 1 | Var | Variant Cover A | Tim Seeley | 2 | Var | Variant Cover B | Nei Ruffino | 3 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Jose Luis | 4 | RI | Retailer Incentive Sketch Cover | Emanuela Lupacchino | 5 | RI | Retailer Incentive Sketch Cover | Tim Seeley | 6 | RI | Retailer Incentive Sketch Cover | Nei Ruffino | 7 | LE | Ultra-Limited High-End Virgin Cover, Limited to 25 | Emanuela Lupacchino | Missing | LE | Ultra-Limited High-End Virgin Cover, Limited to 25 | Tim Seeley | Missing | LE | Ultra-Limited High-End Virgin Cover, Limited to 25 | Nei Ruffino | Missing | LE | Ultra-Limited High-End Virgin Cover, Limited to 25 | Jose Luis | Missing |
